Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 176th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/9/2015...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/13/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $1,950,000 per year...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/29/2019, off Daniel Helmer (SEA)...
Released by Boston on 10/16/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/21/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
